description: Golden fish fillets and fresh salad make for a quick dinner or lunch. Plus, pineapple and Vietnamese dressing put a new spin on the side salad.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Fish,High protein,Low salt,Wheat free,Pineapple,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Summer
name: Crispy Fish With Pineapple Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut fish into 2cmwide strips. Whisk flour, baking powder and iced water together until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Heat 2cm oil in a wok over high heat. Working in 2 batches, dip fish into batter to coat. Lower into hot oil and cook for 4 minutes, turning once, or until crisp and golden. Drain on paper towel.
To make the salad, combine pineapple, tomato, cucumber and coriander in a bowl. Arrange in serving boxes and top each with fish. Serve with dressing.
